_A_RADIO_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: ARadio is a component that allows users to make a single selection from a predefined set of mutually exclusive options.
_A_RADIO_GROUP_COLLAPSE_DESCRIPTION_: Allows for a group of radio buttons to expand and collapse based on the user interaction.
_A_RADIO_GROUP_IS_BUTTON_GROUP_DESCRIPTI: Allows for a switch between the traditional circular radio button appearance and a more button-like style.
_A_RADIO_GROUP_KEY_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_: Specific options can be disabled based on a property in the associated object, with the key name passed as a prop.
_A_RADIO_GROUP_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION_: The search allows users to quickly find and select a specific option by entering a search term. This improves usability for a large list of options.
_A_RADIO_GROUP_TRANSLATE_DATA_DESCRIPTIO: The use of translatable labels for options is supported, allowing the interface to adapt to different languages and regions.
_A_RADIO_GROUP_TWO_COLUMNS_DESCRIPTION_: Passing a class name as a prop determines whether the options are displayed in one or two columns.
_A_RADIO_GROUP_INLINE_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies whether the radio buttons should be displayed in a single line. When set to true, the radio buttons will be rendered inline. Otherwise, they will be displayed vertically.
